short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension to summarize the context of video transcript.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ketti, YouTube Transcript Summarizer

Get the gist of long videos in seconds

Ketti YouTube Transcript Summarizer is a Chrome browser extension that automatically summarizes YouTube transcripts. With just a few clicks, you can get a 100-150 word summary of any YouTube video, even if it's hours long. This is perfect for when you're short on time or just want to get a general overview of a video before watching it.

To use YouTube Transcript Summary, simply install the extension and click on the "Summarize" button. The extension will then generate a summary of the video transcript and display it. 

YouTube Transcript Summary is a free and easy way to get the gist of long videos. Give it a try today!

Features:
- Automatically summarizes YouTube transcripts
- Generates summaries of 100-150 words
- Displays summary under the youtube video

Benefits:
- Saves time
- Helps you decide if you want to watch a video
- Provides a general overview of a video

How to use:
- Install the Ketti YouTube Transcript Summary extension from the Chrome Web Store.
- Go to YouTube and watch a video.
- Click on the "Summarize" button.
- The extension will generate a summary of the video transcript and display.
